评论详情: So I first bought their sweatshirt/sweatpants set in light grey in size large. Love the sweatshirt, fits great, but the pants were super tight, felt like a size small. I decided to buy this coffee color sweatshirt only, size large, and it fits like a 1x, swimming in it even after wash/dry. Love the color and style but so very disappointed it didn't fit the same as the other large I bought, same brand! I really wanted to love this but it just makes me look so much bigger than I really am. What's up with the extreme size difference?

I feel like this would go with any colour leggings or jeans because of its neutral colour. It’s soft and very comfortable. I like the way it looks and fits on me. I got a M and I’m very happy with the size. I will say that when I took it off, there was a lot of fluff transfer on my black t shirt, that’s the only issue but I guess it’s new so that’s normal.
Got this for a gift and they loved it! The fit and matieral is wonderful

The material is soft and cozy, color is great, BUT the Small size is equivalent to XL (I'm 5'2", 135 lbs) on me.  Also, I washed it prior to wearing it and it is shedding horribly.  If it keeps doing it after another wash, I'll not wear it again.
Love these oversized sweatshirts. I have them in several colors!!
Bought to wear on a whale watching excursion. It was fine for the day, but got a huge hole the day I washed it.
This is my favorite sweater I've ever bought on Amazon. I've bought it twice already because I like the soft, warm material. It's great for winter and looks super on trend.

I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and warm this sweatshirt is—it completely exceeded my expectations! The oversized fit is perfect for cozying up during chilly days, and the material feels soft and high-quality. It's a lot warmer than I anticipated, making it ideal for fall and even those brisk winter mornings. The half-zip design adds a stylish touch, and it pairs perfectly with leggings or jeans for a casual yet trendy look.

I really loved this sweatshirt ar first, soft and warm, beautiful,  then I washed it! Terrible shedding and pulling, took over an hour to clean it all up. I returned the 2nd one without opening it because of this. Too bad, such a shame!

I actually loved this sweatshirt but I've only had it a month and the seam is already tearing apart. Nothing happened just normal care And I've only had the chance to wear it maybe 5 times. I am so sad but definitely not worth the money for only a month of use.

Comfortable and cute sweatshirt. Overall, the only thing I don’t like about it is that the seam near the zippers on the inside of the sweatshirt aren’t sewn down so it can look weird if you try to have the collar rolled down instead of straight up

I recommend this long sleeve! It is warm, comfortable, and good length. Great quality! Happy with my purchase and am currently wearing this in the color black as I type this. Size large purchased and true to size fits well!
It’s soft and very comfortable! I’ll be buying a second one in another color.

It's really cute and soft. I'd say medium weight, not too thin but not really thick. I do like it and will wear it a lot! I just feel like it's a bit over priced. It smells when you open the package like that synthetic smell. I'm guessing it's priced at what it is because the style is more so a dupe for name brand similar item that is expensive and popular... I might buy more colors, not sure yet. I am going to wait and see if it shrinks much after washing. I'd say size up if you want it to be a more oversize look.
It is just what I wanted! It is true to how it looks in picture description and is so comfortable!
Fits perfect and is so comfortable!
Great oversized sweatshirt. Nice thick material and comfy.
I bought this specifically for work but now I wear it everywhere. It is so so comfortable and very cute
It’s very warm, looks good.  Feels of good quality and thickness.  It’s soft on the inside.  Great value for the money, I will have this for a long time. The size is perfect for me and true.
im a small ordered me din thing was huge

Oversized only in the sense that it’s roomy but the waistband at the bottom makes it impossible to wear other than cropped (which looks weird like a muffin top because of all the fabric) or over the mid thighs which looks dumb. It was very wrinkly and even steaming it didn’t help? Also, the zipper doesn’t go all the way to the top of the hem, so there’s this open part which might be good for some, but I don’t like the look of it.

评论概述: Sweatshirt quality good; received returned item
评论详情: Sweatshirt quality seemed good so I choose to replace rather than just return after receiving an obvious return. It had no tag, smelled like detergent and had a stain below the zipper.
If you are looking for a cute and baggy sweatshirt, look no further.
It is such a beautiful color. True to size. Lots of room! They did great!
A true over oversized hoodie, love it, wish I could afford to get more colors, prive is too high. Only giving 3 stars because of the price, I got mine during  black friday.
I love it and ordered a grey one but i didn’t realize it was different! This one doesnt have pockets
I’m only taking off a star because the inside sheds like crazyyyyyyyy. Other than that, it’s super cute, soft, and perfectly oversized. For reference, I’m 5’2, 140lbs and I got a small
I bought this for my daughter... It didn't hang on the body the way the photo shows... Just a big square sweatshirt...not much length to it
So comfy, I just wish it had pockets.

So cozy and cute! Very true to size (perhaps slightly large). I (F, 5’10’’, 180) normally wear a women’s large.  I almost ordered and XL so it would be oversized and roomy, I’m so glad I didn’t. The large was more than big enough!
Love the color, the material is soft and fits perfect.  I ordered an XL and I weigh 214 lbs
I love the length of this sweatshirt. I’m 5’10 and this is long enough to cover my butt.
I do love the fit & style of this sweatshirt….. it it bit on the large side but that’s exactly what I wanted. The zipper dresses it up a little too. I would recommend it highly!
Tela muy gruesa y horrible nada que ver ala foto
It’s ok, super cheap material that will shedd all over everything. Very oversized. Color is ok, but overall do not feel this will last long after washing.
Thick soft and didn’t shrink true to size great quality no pockets durable and correct color. Mildly heavy
I really love this sweatshirt, it's thick and has held up well for almost a year! My only complaint is that it is short, and I'm 5'1 with a short torso so tall ladies might have some issues.
I have this in three colors, love the fit, cozy and easy to slip on while doing errands, going to the gym or just  lounging around the house.
Exactly what she wanted.
This is by far my most fav sweatshirt! Super comfortable and oversized

Sure! Here’s a review you could use:  I absolutely love this sweatshirt! It’s incredibly soft and has a cozy, comfortable feel. The slightly oversized fit makes it perfect for lounging or layering on cooler days. The quality is great, and it’s become my go-to piece for casual, relaxed outfits. Highly recommend! I ordered a small and typically a medium
Was super soft. Did not have a pocket. I missed that part when ordering. I sent back :/
I have the gray but returned the brown because the color of this one was a bit more pink/brown than I was hoping! Quality and comfort still the same.

评论用户: Amazon took a picture of it on my porch and then stole it
评论详情: Love this sweatshirt.  True to size maybe even a little bigger than expected but it fits perfectly and will be purchasing more in more colors.  I wish it had pockets but that doesn’t sway me from buying more
this sweater is so comfortable and warm, i love that it is oversized
Easy addition to the closet for comfortable top with jeans, leggings or sweatpants
Color is nice and I sized up to get that comfy cozy feeling but the material isn’t as soft as I had hoped. Maybe after I wash it a few times it will get softer. All in all it’s an ok sweatshirt.
Super comfy and washed well.
Great sweatshirt. Holds up to multiple washing and still looks new. Highly recommend.
This sweatshirt really keeps you warm. Perfect fit so order your true size. Material is not cheap and can wear with anything. Highly recommend purchase.
This top is oversized and super soft and comfy.  I already have two.  Can't go wrong with this top.  Better than a sweatshirt.
This is a beautiful addition to your closet. If you’re torn just BUY IT! I am 5’7 and I got a M. Very happy with the fit (:
This is one of my favorites. Worth the money. Very good quality, thick and so comfortable.

With it being winter, I’m always looking for a big, Oversize hoodie. This one works great! I love that there’s so many colors. With leggings and will be ordering more color soon. It is heavy enough that I wear it if I need to go out. Inside is soft And the length the sleeves is perfect. The only thing that I don’t like about it is the collar at the neck tends to come up so you see the inside of the collar.  I am going to try and pin it down…. Some how
Fits great. Super warm and soft. Fits to size.
This shrunk really badly after one wash and carefully drying on low heat. Almost unwearable. A little disappointing.

The sweatshirt is warm, well-made, and roomy enough to fit comfortably over layering pieces. However, it’s not long enough to cover the backside, which I would prefer for cold weather. Its overall cut—wide but relatively short—creates a boxy, unflattering silhouette.
Definitely a good every day sweater. Layer it up on the cooler days. I’m 5’8 and 160 it does great. Sleeves go just past my wrists but I think it works for the fit. Great gift and value for money
I was really hoping for the color shown in the picture. Instead I got a tan. Coffee gray was what I ordered. Other than that the quality seems to be good.
Loved the size, ordered a Medium and it's still oversized which I wanted. The inside is soft, just be sure not to put it in your dryer or it may lose the softness.

Great for cold days around the house and at home, but stains really easily- I bought the coffee color and lo and behold I spill some coffee on the front and after two washes the stain still wont lift :(
this sweater is so comfortably and a nice dupe!

I cannot say enough good things about this pullover. I've lost some weight so I bought another one in a smaller size, that's how much I love it. It is super soft and stretchy and it keeps me so warm. All the colors are just like they look online and it does not shrink in the wash. If you like oversized then I would stay true to size. I maybe could have gotten a smaller one but I don't think it would have been as comfortable. Love love love these!
Super comfortable, fits just right and is just what I wanted, I ordered a second!
Love this- it's very soft, comfy and warm.  a the light blue color is beautiful too
It was cute but the quality was not up to my standards for the price.
Amazon bag was intact and sweatshirt was still vacuum sealed but when I took the sweatshirt out of the bag it had stains all over it and smells awful.
I usually wear a medium but I got the size large, and it fits just the way I wanted. It’s soft and cozy.

评论概述: Item Shrunk in Cold Water After First Wash
评论详情: The material is heavy and feels good, how ever, this shrunk even when washed in cold water. The oversized fit was ok initially,  it in the wash, the sleeves and body got shorter. The extra material by the zipper also shrunk and won’t lay flat. Unable to return.

To a T description matches what I got. Literally one of the softest jackets I own and want more in different colors. Im 5'7, 175lbs and a Large fits great. Kind of loose but not too baggy for work. Sleeves are good length, not too long to be an issue but also not short.

This is my third purchase. I'm in a size Large. It is a bigger fit so if you don't want oversized I suggest sizing down one. The only reason I gave 4 stars on this is because the color is not the same. I would call this red and not winered. I was really hoping for a deeper color, but it's still really pretty!
This sweatshirt is a better quality than I expected it to be. I sized up one for a more oversized look and to be worn with leggings. I love it! I’m 5’6 155 and bought the large. Perfectly oversized.

it’s def in the larger side so i would def size down. it’s not flattering at all and super boxy. the color is faded and the quality of the fabric is poor. def within a few washes it would take a toll on the appearance. i returned it. better sweaters out there for 30$.

I got to wear this shirt one time. I got two spots on the chest area that should have washed out, but didn’t. I tried pretreating the strains, but they wouldn’t come out. Also, there’s no pockets, which was a let down. I probably should have noticed that before ordering, so my fault.

Pretty thick and just a little stiff. The color is what I don’t like. It almost looks dirty. I ordered the pink and it looks kind of grey and dingy like it got washed with a pair of jeans that bled. That being said it fits and it’s warm. End of story.
Nice and warm and goes down to my hips. Very soft

I just got it so still in its trial run. So far I love the size, it’s a true oversized hoodie. I am currently 7months pregnant and it’s fits really well, not tight at all. It’s soft and warm. I do wish there were pockets. The color is nice. I went with the burgundy color. Giving it 4 stars due to the pocket wish but otherwise the quality seems good so far.

评论概述: So comfy and cozy!  My new favorite pullover!
评论详情: I bought this to wear with leggings, and it did not disappoint!  It's long enough to cover my bottom without being baggy.  The inside is so soft and comfortable and it's nice and thick keeping me really warm in the cooler temps.  It doesn't shrink or lose color in the wash.  I'm definitely buying in more colors!
This is great quality and cute for an oversized look. The material is thick and I still have it a couple years after buying.  Only downside is no pockets!
It’s cute but the color doesn’t match what I ordered. I ordered coffeegrey and the one I received was more tan colored personally does not suit me because it blends with my skin tone.
Accurate measurements, comfy, fit well, sleeve length and length of garment especially pleasing - bought two, will be buying more

I had been eyeing this top for a while. I have long arms and wasn’t sure it would fit my arm length. It fits perfectly and is so comfortable. I purchased my regular size which is a small and the oversized fit of the top is just right. I loved all the color options as well and will likely buy more.

I got the coffee grey color in size medium and love it. Seems like a good quality sweatshirt. I actually like that the zipper doesn’t go all the way up the color, I’d never wanna wear it completely zipped up anyway. I’m usually between size small and medium and I got the medium. It’s not as oversized on me as it looks on the model in the photos, so I’d size up to a large if you want to achieve that look. However, I’m perfectly happy with it being just a little oversized. I’m 5’6 and this covers my bottom, so is perfect to wear with leggings. This’ll definitely be a frequently worn item in my closet that is already filled with dozens of sweaters and sweatshirts.

评论概述: Cute and comfy but fluff everywhere
评论详情: It is super cute and comfy. However, there is fuzz everywhere after the first watch. The material on the inside immediately fell apart and leaves tiny balls of fluff repeatedly everywhere.

This is a must have basic! I typically pair it with leggings or workout pants. It is true to size. I am 5’7” and fluctuate between 140-145 and I ordered a medium. If you are looking for a more oversized look I would size up. I bought two (white and green) I returned the green because I wasn’t a fan of the color in person. Overall this is a nice staple for your everyday wear.

The pictures from the description and reviews don’t do the top justice. It is very thick and nicely oversized. I’m 5’7.5”/137 with very long legs and arms and the small is more than perfect. I would definitely recommend. The top also does well if you choose to embroider it.. does not gather or tear.

Super comfortable and perfect for cool fall weather… it fits well and washed well but did shrink up a bit in the dryer… I ordered my normal size and because it’s oversized still fits comfortably after the little bit of shrinkage
Color was different than in the image
This is a great quality, thick but also comfortable. I will say that this doesn’t run very oversized so if you want that oversized look size up!
The zip part on the neck is kind of weird and it didn’t feel very good quality. It’s okay though.

Very warm and cozy.  Thick material.  It did smell terrible but one wash and it was fine.  Multiple posts said to buy up a size.  I wear XL but got XXL. I did not need to buy up.  XL would have been fine. I bought it for around home but would run to grocery store in it too.  Happy with my purchase and only knocked star off due to the smell

Not sure why this product has 5 stars because it is HUGE. Once it arrived at my house it looked like a cheap sweatshirt one might find at Walmart. I ordered a medium and it is to my knees, it’s HUGE. I’m kinda chunky so I normally wear a medium or large depending on the brand but any of these reviews that say it’s true to size are misleading. I’m disappointed.
Not only looks really nice but it’s also warm. I love it! I have it in different colors. I got a size S, i’m 140lbs for reference. Will get more.
High quality and great value for the money

This 1/4 zip pullover is so soft and cuddly!  I purchased the xl in Apricot.  It is a beautiful very French vanilla color.  I am 5’6 tall and 190lbs and it fits very oversized on me.  The zipper is contrasted in black. Is it worth the $35?  Yes, but would be easier to purchase if it were less…it hurt a bit paying that but will keep because I love it!  Great quality!!
This sweatshirt was really pretty, and it was high quality, but way too oversized for my liking.  I returned it.
Good weight and not too thick. Just right oversized fit
Love this sweater, it can be worn as an indoor lazy day sweater or it can be worn casual. Comfortable, and cute.
This is one of my favorite pieces of clothing now! So warm and soft!
This is so comfy!  it is big overall but that is just what I wanted.  love it
